newsitem.title: USA: Best Buy Sept same store sales drop.
newsitem.headline: Best Buy Sept same store sales drop.

text.p: Best Buy Co Inc said Thursday its same store sales fell two percent in September.
Year-to-date, comparable store sales were up three percent.
For the five weeks ended October 5, total September sales were $689 million, up 13 percent from $611 million for the year-ago five-week period.
Year-to-date sales of $4.105 billion were up 23 percent from $3.324 billion last year.
Best Buy said it currently operates 262 stores, 213 of which were considered comparable in September.
Prior to the upcoming holiday season, the company expects to open 10 new Best Buy stores, including entry into the Tampa, Fla., market, it added.
